body:
The indexing might be easier to understand if we encoded this as a format string rather than a list of indices:

```
print("hi ", a, "another ", " two strings", b)

becomes

format="stsst";
strings = ["hi", "another ", " two strings"]
```

This is how we handle python arguments to PythonOp calls as well.
